CustomField.formula: IF(Case_SLA_Status__c == 'L3', IMAGE("/resource/GreenDot", "green_dot", 30, 30), IF(Case_SLA_Status__c == 'L2', IMAGE("/resource/YellowDot", "yellow_dot", 30, 30), IF(Case_SLA_Status__c == 'L1', IMAGE("/resource/OrangeDot", "orange_dot", 30, 30), IMAGE("/resource/RedDot", "red_dot", 30, 30) )))
CustomField.label: Status Indicator
